A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A rather messy collection of foolish plots. Andy Serkis pulls off a brilliant CGI Snoak\, a character wasted by his demise. Kylo Ren taking over the First Order with a bit of light choking hardly seems like a strong basis for constitutional government. The casino/hacker plot is really weird and the main plot is contradicted by its own ending. Briefly\, General Organa turns into The Flying Nun. The connection between Kylo and Daisy however was marvellously done: regrettably it was the only human connection in the entire film and seemed to be from a totally different movie. Meh.
